channel.title: I have some VPS questions
channel.description: I am creating a server and I want to create my own website with forums and my own webclient. I know that to do that I need a VPS. Where could I get the best deal or what amount of memory, bandwidth, ghz I need to properly host my server without lag. I really have no idea what I should be doing so please give me all of the info you can give abOut me hosting my server. Like what I need to make a d how do I get a webclient etc. Thank you, Tyler

item.title: I have some VPS questions
item.dc:creator: @ibarageu ibarageu
item.description:
@ibarageu wrote:

O.K. So can you help me set up my own server on a website? I will help pay for your VPS

Read full topic

item.title: I have some VPS questions
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

get a vps dont unblock ur ports your pc will be down in out quick, people like to hack others who do that. cheapest vps is dewlance.com, only 12 a month for their cheapest it can hold up to 20 players that is good for a starting server u need to turn firewalls off and need to disable security for it to work took me like 20 min to figure out but all ports are open firewall jus blocks it

Read full topic

item.title: I have some VPS questions
item.dc:creator: @ibarageu ibarageu
item.description:
@ibarageu wrote:

Ok so that means I don’t need a VPS, cause I’m pretty sure to be succesful to run a server. CAn ssomeone give me a good place to host and what amount of memory I need

Read full topic

item.title: I have some VPS questions
item.dc:creator: @HonorScape HonorScape
item.description:
@HonorScape wrote:

To create the website, find a webhost or some free forums you want and do whatever you want to set them up.

For the webhost, you don’t need a vps, you just need some money for the site to host it for you.

I don’t know about the vps, I myself am looking for one too.

To get a webclient, look here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,336494.0.html

You need a site that you can put html codes into.

Read full topic
